QuestName: Not All Treasure Should Be Found

MemoryInfobox.name: Not All Treasure Should Be Found
MemoryInfobox.image: ACOD Not All Treasure Should Be Found 19.png
MemoryInfobox.description: 'With the knowledge that a real treasure was hidden somewhere on Korfu, Barnabas and Herodotos urged Kassandra to track down the Treasure Hunter's Apple of Eden|coveted prize.'
MemoryInfobox.appearance: 'Assassin's Creed: Odyssey – Assassin's Creed Crossover Stories'

General_Description: '''Not All Treasure Should Be Found''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s [[Genetic memory|genetic memories]], relived by [[Layla Hassan]] in 2018 through the [[Animus|Portable Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: After learning of a real [[Treasure Hunter's Apple of Eden|treasure]] mentioned in a letter written in {{Wiki|Doric Greek|Dorian Greek}}, Kassandra set out to search for the key to the treasure in a [[Sunken Temple, Korfu|sunken temple]].
Section_Outcome:
Kassandra's search for the treasure led her to an encounter with an Apple of Eden. After killing the [[Mad Captain|pirate captain]] corrupted by its power, Kassandra's [[Spear of Leonidas|spear]] was disabled by the Apple before being launched away due it the overwhelming surge of power.

{{-}}
